meanings.definition: A region of injured tissue or skin in which blood capillaries have been ruptured; a bruise.
meanings.sent1: After the fall, he had a painful contusion on his arm.
meanings.sent2: The contusion on her leg turned purple and yellow as it healed.
meanings.sent3: The contusion on his forehead made him look like he had a colorful badge.
meanings.sent4: Her contusion was a vivid reminder of the accident.
meanings.sent5: The contusion throbbed with each heartbeat, a constant reminder of the injury.

meanings.sent1: The contusion of the fruit occurred when it fell from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The contusion of the skin happened due to the impact.
meanings.sent3: The contusion of the banana made it look like a bruised warrior.
meanings.sent4: His words left a contusion on her heart, unseen but felt deeply.
meanings.sent5: The contusion of emotions left a mark on their relationship, slowly fading with time.
